text.section: In addition to the days allowed for sales under KRS 248.370 each warehouse may operate one (1) Saturday during each season for the sale of tobacco grown by persons under twenty-one (21) years of age under a vocational education program sponsored by county agents or other county, state or federal agencies.
KRS 248.440 shall not apply to such sales.

law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4814c-9.
